resources.string: You have six (6) guesses to guess the word. Each guess must be a valid five (5) letter word. You submit your guess pressing the enter button on your keyboard. After each attempt, the colour of the boxes will change to show you how close you are to the correct answer.
The letter "W" is in the word and in the right position.
The letter "I" is in the word, but in the wrong position.
There is no letter "U" in the word.
